        protected boolean keepOpen
        Whether the worker should stay running after executing the commands specified on the command line.

      • interactiveShell

        protected boolean interactiveShell
        Whether to have an interactive shell. A non-interactive shell this is useful when the worker is started with a disconnected stdin.

      • defaultHandler

        protected int defaultHandler(java.lang.String[] args,
                 int index)
        Description copied from class: Options
        Handles an argument that doesn't match any known flag.
        Overrides:
        defaultHandler in class Options
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments from the command line.
        index - The index of the argument following the usage flag.
        Returns:
        The next index to be processed. e.g., if calling this method processes two arguments, then the return value should be index+2.
